Improvements.Improvement: Replace Anonymous Class with Lambda Expression
Improvements.Description: The anonymous class that implements Runnable can be replaced with a lambda expression. This will make the code more concise and easier to read.

Improvements.Improvement: Define Constants instead of Magic Values
Improvements.Description: Values such as 60000, 4, 1 appear multiple times in the code. These are magic values and should be replaced with well-named constants to improve readability.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract Method for Code Reusability and Readability
Improvements.Description: The code inside the try block is quite long and it performs multiple tasks. Extracting some logic into separate methods would make the code more readable and maintainable.
